abstract: United Nations report says Rwandan government covertly trained force to topple Burundi's fragile government; confidential memo, now made public, confirms rumors of plan by Rwanda, whose formidable army has involved itself in several African conflicts, to exploit political chaos in Burundi after contested election there.

headline.print_headline: Rwanda Plot Was Aimed at Burundi, Memo Says
headline.main: U.N. Report Accuses Rwanda of Training Rebels to Oust Burundian Leader

snippet: The report said investigators had spoken with 18 Burundian rebels who claimed to have been trained inside Rwanda.
lead_paragraph: The report said investigators had spoken with 18 Burundian rebels who claimed to have been trained inside Rwanda.
